commandText:
SELECT TOP(1) COUNT(*) AS [TotalPosts], COUNT(CASE
    WHEN [t].[IsPublished] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN 1
END) AS [PublishedPosts], COUNT(CASE
    WHEN [t].[IsPublished] = CAST(0 AS bit) THEN 1
END) AS [UnpublishedPosts]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[IsPublished], 1 AS [Key]
    FROM [Posts] AS [p]
) AS [t]
GROUP BY [t].[Key]

SELECT TOP(1) COUNT(*) AS [TotalPosts], COUNT(CASE
    WHEN [t].[IsPublished] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN 1
END) AS [PublishedPosts], COUNT(CASE
    WHEN [t].[IsPublished] = CAST(0 AS bit) THEN 1
END) AS [UnpublishedPosts]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[IsPublished], 1 AS [Key]
    FROM [Posts] AS [p]
) AS [t]
GROUP BY [t].[Key]
